scripts.yalc-link:react: npm run yalc:assets && cd react && npx yalc link @massds/mayflower-assets
scripts.yalc-link:patternlab: npm run yalc:assets && cd patternlab/styleguide && npx yalc link @massds/mayflower-assets
scripts.yalc-link:site: npm run yalc:assets && npm run yalc:react && cd site && npx yalc link @massds/mayflower-assets @massds/mayflower-react
scripts.develop:react: npm run yalc-link:react && cd react && npm run start
scripts.develop:patternlab: npm run yalc-link:patternlab && cd patternlab/styleguide && npm run gulp
scripts.develop:site: npm run yalc-link:site && cd site && npm run develop
scripts.build:react: npm run yalc-link:react && cd react && npm run build
scripts.build:react-storybook: npm run yalc-link:react && cd react && npm run build-storybook
scripts.build:patternlab: npm run yalc-link:patternlab && cd patternlab/styleguide && npm run gulp patternlab:build
scripts.build:site: npm run yalc-link:site && cd site && npm run build
